title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: It's a pretty safe bet that you are either asking for assistance or offering it today. In fact, you and a colleague might support each other in many meaningful ways. Perhaps you lend a hand with a tedious chore or an ally might proffer some choice advice. However, whatever is exchanged between you is not as important as the love and respect you hold for each other. This emotional bond can be life-affirming for both of you. Roman philosopher Seneca wrote, One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
